email.created_account_in_organization_de: Hello {{username}}, an account has been created for you in {{orgName}} on {{appName}}.
email.invite_description: you have been invited to {{appName}} by
email.invite_expire: This link will expire in 7 days.
email.invite_in_organization_preview_tex: You have been invited to join {{orgName}} on {{appName}}
email.invite_preview_text: You have been invited to join {{appName}}
email.invite_reply_to: Reply to this email if you have any questions.
email.invite_title: You have been invited to join {{appName}}
email.invite_to_organization_description: you have been invited to {{orgName}} on {{appName}} by
email.invite_to_organization_title: You have been invited to join {{orgName}}
email.newsletter_title: You've received a note as a member of {{orgName}}
email.reset_password_text_1: A password reset link has been requested for your {{appName}} account. If this was you, you can set a new password here:
email.reset_password_text_2: This link will expire in 3 hours. To get a new password reset link, visit:
email.reset_password_text_3: Ignore this email if you don't want to change your password or didn't request it.
email.verification_text_1: Hi, you are almost ready to start on {{appName}}! Click the link below to verify your email address and get started. The link expires in 2 hours.
invalid.color: Color may only contain letters, numbers & starts with #
invalid.domain: Domain must not contain @, no special chars and at least one dot (.) in between.
invalid.min_items: Please add at least {{items_count}} {{item}} to the list.
invalid.min_length_greater_or_eq: Must be greater or equal to {{length}}
invalid.name: Name may only contain letters, numbers, spaces and these characters: ,.'-
invalid.slug: Slug may only contain alphanumeric characters or up to three hyphens, and cannot begin or end with a hyphen.
